org.ardenus.graphics.image

Class Texture

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.graphics.image.Texture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deletable, ResourceListener

    public class Texture
extends java.lang.Object
implements Deletable, ResourceListener
    Represents a texture in OpenGL.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

      • updateTexture

        private void updateTexture()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Updates the image of the texture. This method is normally called whenever the texture is first initialized or the resource it is reading from has been updated.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
